5617225a7575188baa0a7da283057d5a (17:55): i have 2 gw ( eth0 and eth1 ) my LAN using eth 3 ... i have already masquerade both gw ... but now i want to foward port 80 to gw eth0 only and port 21 using eth1 what is the command using iptables ?
4040c869e4fa0ff636def48c29322ee2 (17:57): Badm4n: iptables -A FORWARD -j tcp -i eth3 --dport 80 -j ROUTE -oif eth0 <- try that
5617225a7575188baa0a7da283057d5a (17:57): root@Rendezvous:/home/mirza# iptables -A FORWARD -j -p tcp -i eth3 --dport 80 -j ROUTE -oif eth0

4040c869e4fa0ff636def48c29322ee2 (18:07): 'iptables -j ROUTE -help'. does it say --oif in the helpfile?
4040c869e4fa0ff636def48c29322ee2 (18:15): okay, looks like ROUTE might be missing.
